KitKat::

"I am a warrior. I do not know what I would do if there were no more 
battles to be had. The thought stresses at my mental circuits once in 
a while."  She suddenly felt like she was whining and complaining 
over nothing. A warrior doesn't moan and groan. A warrior stands firm 
and always looks and acts like a warrior.  She looked at 
SharpClaw. "But then again, you are right. There will be another time 
to fight after the victory here."  She slammed the rest of the 
energon and stood up. "Come, if the leader has no need for us, 
perhaps we can pratice a while. Want to spar a bit?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw: I imagine we would return to Cybertron. Someone has got
